concept.title: iPhone App
concept.shortdesc: The iPhone app provides basic information about your campaigns when you are away from your computer.

conbody.p: Although the app is designed and tested for iPhone 3.2 and above, it can be viewed on other 3G/3GS iOS devices.
To get the app, search for "Test&Target" in iTunes.
The app was designed for two primary use cases:

ul.li:
View campaign performance
For example, you are asked how a campaign is performing. Go into iPhone app, find the campaign, and view high-level, overall, and experience-level reports. You can see all the basic info for AOV, RPV, CR, Visitors, and Conversion.

Activate or deactivate a campaign
For example, you are called while you’re out of the office about a campaign that is causing problems on the site. Use the app to find the campaign in question and change its status.

conbody.p: You can also use the app to view basic details about a campaign.
